meanings.definition: A tropical climbing plant with brightly colored flowers.
meanings.sent1: The bougainvillaeas climbed up the trellis in the garden.
meanings.sent2: I love the vibrant colors of bougainvillaeas in full bloom.
meanings.sent3: The bougainvillaeas seemed to wave hello as I passed by.
meanings.sent4: Her personality was like a bougainvillaeas, bright and captivating.
meanings.sent5: The bougainvillaeas added a pop of color to the green landscape.

meanings.definition: The flowers of the bougainvillea plant.
meanings.sent1: The bouquet was filled with beautiful bougainvillaeas.
meanings.sent2: She adorned her hair with bougainvillaeas for the special occasion.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel stole a bougainvillaeas and ran off.
meanings.sent4: Her smile bloomed like a bougainvillaeas in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The scent of bougainvillaeas filled the air with sweetness.
